messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine an art office with 21 artists. Amy is working with Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Fay, and Gus. Ian is working with Joe, Kim, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Sue is working with Tom, Zac, Kai, Liv, Pam, and Gia. Fay is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, and Eva. Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob. Kim is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Ned is working with Ola, Joe, Leo, and Max. Pam is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, Kai, and Liv. Eva is working with Gus, Bob and Zac. Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe. Max is connected to Ola and Joe. Liv is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, and Kai. Gus is working with Bob, and Dan. Ola is working with Joe. Gia is working Tom, Zac, and Kai. Bob is working with Dan. Joe is working with Kai. Kai is working with Tom. Tom is working with Zac. What is the shortest path from Gus to Liv? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

Gus is working with Bob, and Dan, Eva is working with Gus, Bob, and Zac, Bob is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola, Dan is working with Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola, Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe, Fay is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob, Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob, Dan is working with Eva, Gus, and Zac, Eva is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, and Zac, Bob is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola, Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe, Gus is working with Bob, and Dan, Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob, Gus is working with Bob, and Dan, Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob, Gus is working with Bob, and Dan, Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob, Eva is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Zac is working with Gus, Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola
